title: HT-840 Extra-Firm Silicone Foam
fileContent: The information contained in this Data Sheet is intended to assist you in designing with Rogers’ Elastomeric Material Solutions.   It is not intended to and does not create any warranties, express or implied, including any warranty of merchantability or  fitness for a particular purpose or that the results shown in this Data Sheet will be achieved by a user for a particular purpose.  The user should determine the suitability of Rogers BISCO products for each application. The Rogers logo, BISCO, and the BISCO   logo are trademarks of Rogers Corporation or one of its subsidiaries. ©   201 6 ,  2019 , 2020   Rogers   Corporation.   A ll rights reserved.  0320 -PDF • Publication #180- 321     Product Data Sheet BISCO®  HT-8 4 0 BISCO® HT-840 extra firm exhibits  enhanced sealing capabilities, with  comparable tear and tensile strength   of a  traditional sponge rubber.   Patented  chemistry and cell structure provide  a  long term performance advantage. • Temperature independency • UV/ Ozone resistant • Rated to most stringent flame standards Features & Benefits, applicable to all BISCO® Cellular Materials (Foams):  PROPERTY TEST METHOD TYPICAL VALUE* SPECIFICATION** PHYSICAL   Color   Gray Thickness,  mm  ( inches )  Density,  kg/m³ (lb./ft ³ )    ( 2  ) 1 2   ( 20.6 )   110  -  1 79   (1 6  - 2 6 )  Compression Force Deflection,  kPa   (psi) 1.8 < 5 V isual   ASTM  D 10 56 Compression Set, %   ---  1.5 9 -  6.35 (0.0 63  - 0. 25 0)  3 69  - 5 53 ( 23.7  -  3 4.5 )  Internal Internal See "Width Tolerance" table   0 .5 --- Water Absorption , %   Specification values in bold are tested on a batch basis.
